title: How to Make Mansaf with Pickled Turnips

steps.headline: Mix the egg, flour and the salt with yogurt in a bowl.
steps.description: Keep stirring until you are sure the mixture is blended.

steps.headline: Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
steps.description: Add the chicken and cook for about 10 to 15 minutes until it's yellow to brown.

steps.headline: Add the yogurt mixture to a saucepan.
steps.description: Start stirring the yogurt with a plastic spoon.

steps.headline: Stop stirring when the mixture starts boiling.
steps.description: Lower the heat when you do this step.

steps.headline: Add the chicken to the yogurt.
steps.description: Without stirring, leave it until it starts boiling again.

steps.headline: Soak the rice on a hot water for about 15 minutes.
steps.description: Wash the rice with a sieve.

steps.headline: Heat oil in another saucepan over medium-high heat.
steps.description: Add the rice and mix for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Add water, oil and salt, and leave it to boil.
steps.description: Lower the heat until the rice is cooked.

steps.headline: Pour the cooked yogurt into a plate.
steps.description: Cut the pickled turnips and sprinkle it on the top.

steps.headline: Place the rice on a plate.
steps.description: Put the chicken you like with the pickled turnips on top of the rice.

Soak the rice on a hot water for about 15 minutes. Wash the rice with a sieve. Heat oil in another saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the rice and mix for 2 minutes. Add water, oil and salt, and leave it to boil. Lower the heat until the rice is cooked. Pour the cooked yogurt into a plate. Cut the pickled turnips and sprinkle it on the top. Place the rice on a plate. Put the chicken you like with the pickled turnips on top of the rice.
